briefTitle: A Phase Ⅱ Study of Anlotinib Combined With Tislelizumab and AT in the Neoadjuvant Treatment of Triple-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Prospective, Open, Single-arm, Phase Ⅱ Clinical Study of Anlotinib Combined With Tislelizumab and AT in the Neoadjuvant Treatment of Triple-negative Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Pathological complete response (pCR) rate using the definition of ypT0/Tis ypN0 (i.e., no invasive residual in breast or nodes; noninvasive breast residuals allowed) at the time of definitive surgery
